A little guide:

1_ Download the Torrent , Extract PC_Risen.-TPTB.7z
2_Run Setup.exe and follow the process, when  setup asks to overwrite a file click YES.
3_Wait the Install.
4_When finish take the Russian Mini-Image from GameCopyWorld ( http://m0004.gamecopyworld.com/games/pc_risen.shtml#Risen [RUSSIAN] No-DVD/Fixed Image )
5_Mount the Mini-Image , then play the game from the Desktop.

Works fine in Windows Vista Ultimate SP2.

Thanks allot man...
I know it isn't the uploader's doing - I just want to point out some things for TPTB's next release...I couldn't exit the TPTB intro and had to end the proccess...on the first time you execute the game a suspicious driver installation is asked of you and it gets quarantined by Kaspersky anti-virus (this JUST happened and I deleted the bad files so ill wait and see if all is alright) ...if you press ESC in the intro movie it exists to the desktop while still running sound and I can't get back to the game...

Note that the installer says it needs 7GB but the game took only 2GB on my computer and I DID cut the RISEN directory from C: and put it in D: - so the ESC problem could be my own fault...

I probably sound very stupid complaining about these problems especially since this game isn't really out here (or wasn't at least) and some other reasons that give me no say in this whatsoever.... ;)
...So I want to thank TPTB for their release (unless there is some spyware on my system - though I don't really see a reason for TPTB to do this...) and I want to thank my mother for all that she did to me....and my dad who kept his distance for all these years...and the police for putting me here !!!!!

Thanks allot...!!!

@people who needs the crack:

1) go to www.gamecopyworld.com
2) search for "risen"
3) download "Risen [RUSSIAN] No-DVD/Fixed Image #2". Nevermind the "RUSSIAN" bit, it works perfectly with this (english) version.
4) Follow the instructions included in that file.

NOTE: The mini-image CANNOT be mounted with clonecd or Daemon tools _LITE_. I found that it worked with Daemon tools _PRO_.
